lenders.occupational_info: I am a pig farmer

lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I conduct research to find new pharmaceutical products.

lenders.name: athena
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.occupation: commissioning editor at a performing rights agency

lenders.name: Shamsuddin Delhiwala
lenders.loan_because: equal opportunity is a right for everyone of our neighbors, especially the ones in the 3rd world, and micro-financing is the best way to reach the underprivileged and for them to benefit from it.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I want to change the world.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I am a former banker.
lenders.occupational_info: Now just work part time at things that interest me.

lenders.name: Nadia
lenders.loan_because: it empowers people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Working to protect groundwater for drinking water and agricultural uses.

lenders.name: Janna
lenders.loan_because: I want to see people acheive their goals in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a woman who works in the construction trades doing low voltage wiring/installation for electrical companies who have a contract the electrical union(local IBEW46) in Washingtion state.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes people just need a leg up.  I can give them that.
lenders.occupational_info: I have the privilege of investing in the lives of college students at the University of Maryland and sharing the love of Christ with them through The Navigators collegiate ministry.

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: I like to.
lenders.occupational_info: I feel really fortunate to have stumbled across this fun, easy way to be involved and I'm lucky to have the (relatively carefree) life I have.

lenders.name: Teressa
lenders.loan_because: James 2:14-17 - What good is it, my brothers, if a man claims to have faith but has no deeds? Can such faith save him? Suppose a brother or sister is without clothes and daily food. If one of you says to him, “Go, I wish you well; keep warm and well fed,” but does nothing about his physical needs, what good is it? In the same way, faith by itself, if it is not accompanied by action, is dead.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: The world is not a fair place.
lenders.occupational_info: I study study study.

lenders.name: Jimmy
lenders.loan_because: I strongly believe in capitalism with a heart and that everyone deserves an opportunity to make a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I acquire business, specifically companies that perform information technology services for the government.

lenders.name: Taylor
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people!  And giving to others makes me feel connected.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school students how to think for themselves and value their own minds.  I thrive on showing young people how amazing they are.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people and make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.occupation: writer, translator, Hon. Consul of Hungary

lenders.name: Trish
lenders.loan_because: All people need the opportunity to improve themselves and their business.
lenders.occupational_info: work in the electric utility business

lenders.name: Marley
lenders.loan_because: I always believe in helping others out.  When I came across Kiva, I thought this is a perfect way to help people earn a livelihood by starting a small business.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for AlaskaJobFinder.com.  We specializes in helping people get jobs in the Alaska fishing industry and travel and hospitality industries.  Our website includes insider tips, authoritative content, video clips, over 12,000 employer profiles, resume posting and exclusive job postings.

I have traveled to over thirty countries and try to travel whenever possible.  I also am an avid hiker and fisherman.

lenders.name: peter
lenders.loan_because: Gratitude !                                                 Helping others who are helping themselves by working hard, will raise they're selfesteem . Puting  it in words (YOU CAN DO IT ! )  The  inspiration to dream and to have dreams .
lenders.occupational_info: I install carpet,vinyl,ceramic, and wood flooring in new and older homes .

lenders.name: Jerry and Karen
lenders.loan_because: We  want to share God's blessings with others.
lenders.occupational_info: We design and build communication and transportation products .

lenders.name: JobMonkey
lenders.loan_because: We at JobMonkey.com really believe in the "Entrepreneurial Spirit".  We love what Kiva has done in making it easy to lend money to entrepreneurs worldwide.  We will continue to promote Kiva to other people and hope you do also.
lenders.occupational_info: JobMonkey.com is the leader in providing information on "cool jobs" around the world.  We believe that people should get out and travel.  Since many people do not have the financial resources to do this, we developed a website to help people work while they travel.  For more information visit  www.JobMonkey.com

lenders.name: Dan & Deborah
lenders.loan_because: We are blessed.
lenders.occupational_info:
Deborah is the Community Relations Manager for her local Barnes & Noble Bookseller. She spends her days surrounded by books and people who love books.
Dan is a retired business man.
Their passion is travel, which they report on in their blog.

lenders.name: Tessa
lenders.loan_because: i can
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school, I learn, I come home and repeat the process daily, except when I travel.

lenders.name: Gareth Chantler
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of microcredit loans over charity. I believe in empowering hard working people with good ideas.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: Sharing is the mightiest & most creative power we human beings have.
lenders.occupational_info: Being in the present moment.

lenders.name: Deanna
lenders.loan_because: it's a great way to really make a difference with your dollars / charity!

lenders.name: Dane
lenders.loan_because: I am a strong proponent of worldwide entrepreneurism and like to assist when I can.  I really like how Kiva allows me to research and loan money to people all over the world.  I really hope that my loans are making a difference in people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for CruiseJobFinder.com. We help match cruise ship, resort and tourism employers with qualified job seekers.  Jobseekers get extensive background info, detailed company profiles, resume database and job postings and insider tips which helps them more efficiently research and apply for cruise ship jobs and other travel related jobs.  Employers post job openings and list their company profile for free.

Personally i enjoy traveling, reading, cooking, playing and watching sports, biking  and helping in my community.

lenders.name: Peter & Bea
lenders.loan_because: we can

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: "We cannot do everything at once, but we can do something at once" - Calvin Coolidge

lenders.name: Jacob
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Nikki
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because I was given this opportunity to give back as a Christmas present from someone very close to my heart. After researching this wonderful organization I thought what a privilege it would be for me to take part in helping all these people and families that have the same drive and desire to succeed as I do.   
  As I read and learn more and more about people and the different cultures we all live in, it makes me appreciate more of the little things that I get to enjoy everyday with my family and friends. I mean having a job and my own money “what a wonderful thing” and what a greater gift to be able to give back!  We truly can all make a difference with just a little!!!
lenders.occupational_info:
I currently work for a newspaper in my little town I live in (Jerome, Idaho). There’s not much to say about my job other then they call me “The Girl Friday”. I do a little bit of everything. Most of my days are spent in front of a computer Imputing data, publishing county and city legal ads, keeping track of subscriptions and our circulation of the news papers.
My second job is being a mom of a little boy we call Brodie. He is 7 and in the 2nd grade. We have 3 dogs, Abbey, Bogger and Mason and 2 cats, Princess and Bella. Needless to say our house is a little crazy almost all the time.
I also have a boyfriend and a step daughter Natalie who is 3 and tons of fun too.

lenders.name: Francesca Greco
lenders.loan_because: I can !
lenders.occupational_info: I am working in international cooperation projects and local development in the field of eco-turism and environmental issues in general.  I am a water-right activitst

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.

lenders.name: Kerri and Matt
lenders.loan_because: we want to share our blessings and extend a helping hand to those who need it.

lenders.name: Jello Diva
lenders.loan_because: As an entrepreneur myself, I want to help other women around the world achieve their dreams of supporting themselves and their families with their own businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I write and publish a website about all things jello!

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: It is one of the easiest, cheapest and best ways to genuinely help change the world for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an independent consultant who helps entrepreneurs manage their business by providing advice and services focused on finance and business strategy.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I can!  I am on a limited income but rich in so many other ways.  It is an honor to be able to help!

lenders.name: Morphex
lenders.loan_because: It empowers people who normally would have a hard time getting a loan to begin or expand a business.  Building business is important for oneself and for the community and microlending is one of the most constructive forms of charity IMO.
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepeneur, started a company with a friend, without money.  With hard work, we're doing OK.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I want to give opportunities to people who have great aspirations.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: It helps people who really need support. It makes my heart feel good.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a recently retired Registered Nurse. I look for opportunities to be of service to others throughout the world.

lenders.name: Marie-Lucie et Joe
lenders.loan_because: Seek Wonder and Create Harmony...

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: We are grateful for having such a great life that we want others to have opportunities that we have.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a wrtier who has written seven books.

lenders.name: David & Carol
lenders.loan_because: Our daughter got us started and it seems to be a good way to help people.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to high school students and children with special needs in Japan.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: Because I'm lucky enough to live a very blessed life, I hope to help others become blessed as well.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: This is what it is all about... we are here to help & serve each other... What an amazing that KIVA is to this world!  I am blessed to be a very small part of it... Thank You!
lenders.occupational_info: I sing in a big show in Las Vegas every night....

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: in the United States we have the infrastructure to allow entrepreneurs to borrow money and as an entrepreneur I know how important it is to have the ability to borrow money.
lenders.occupational_info: Web & Software Consulting, Information Architecture, and a Real Estate-based Internet Startup.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because:
I care about the people and believe people should be treated equally.

All in all, I'm a hippie.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of being able to see exactly where the money is going, and I like that the people borrowing are given the responsibility and respect of paying the loan money back.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a community pharmacist, meaning I dispense medication and ensure that patients understand how to correctly take their medication. I also give vaccinations.

lenders.name: Edw
lenders.loan_because: Почему нет?
lenders.occupational_info: bicycle repairman and biscuit disposal

lenders.name: Sabrina
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the pride and confidence resulting from successful loan repayment (rather than simple charity) will have a huge impact on the lives of these entrepreneurs, changing them forever--and for such a small impact on my checkbook.
lenders.occupational_info: I help keep track of the money my company makes & spends.

lenders.name: Caribbean_Man
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it is very important for persons of African ancestry to invest and volunteer in projects in the motherland.
lenders.occupational_info: I work and live for the day when African people gain economic independence

lenders.name: Jan and Bill
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others to help themselves. This is also an empowering and incredible way to connect the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people in companies around the world to help them reach their potential as leaders. My hope is that this will help them succeed in business, in relationships, and in life -- which I believe are intertwined.

lenders.name: Laura Jeam
lenders.loan_because: These small contributions can have a significant impact on the lives of people around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Smile, Eat, Poop and Sleep. Repeat.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: It's my chance show someone half way around the world that I support them in trying to improve their life, that I care, and that I want them to succeed!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children gymnastics.  I also teach them not to give up, that they have to keep working hard if they want something, and I show them why they should feel good about who they are.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I like to help.

lenders.name: Bethany
lenders.loan_because: i think it is a good cause.

lenders.occupational_info: I build custom cars

lenders.loan_because: I feel like I am very blessed and want to help others.

lenders.occupational_info: I drive around in a big brown truck and deliver packages to homes and businesses.   www.ups.com

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference in somebodies life by doing this.
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching is more than providing facts and methods.  It is a way to broaden young people's view of the world.

Our family has been blessed and we want to share with those in need.
 "To whom much is given, of him much will be required."  Luke 12:48

lenders.occupational_info: As Anne Marie in Nairobi said to me, I help people have a good heart.

lenders.occupational_info: Im A Paper boy, look after my little brothers and sisters, Help out my mom with house work, do my home work.

lenders.occupational_info: I help teach middle school students, most of whom live in underprivileged communities, about leadership and volunteer work.

lenders.name: Beryl

lenders.name: Ken

lenders.occupational_info: I study earthquakes, especially the San Andreas fault system, to improve public safety. My employer is the US government.

lenders.name: Cristen

lenders.occupational_info: I help people find information, in books and on the Internet.  If someone has a question, they can ask me and I can find the answer.  I also work with children to inspire them to read and grow.

lenders.name: Ron & David
lenders.loan_because: Because we have one hell-of-a -lot-more than they have.

lenders.name: Chand and Amrita
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves an opportunity to succeed.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microfinance is a better solution for poverty than charity is.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at Zynga, where I help to create some of the most popular social games on the iPhone. I coordinate the engineering, design, and marketing efforts necessary to create and maintain our iPhone games.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for all I have been given , and to all of those who  helped me in my journey.   Every act of sharing increases the light in the world...  Every act of love, every wilingness to help another helps each of us and the planet... what an easy act,  to say yes to so small a request, and give another the means to help him/herself with dignity.  And each small kindness, that  sharing karma , goes round without end.
lenders.occupational_info: Diagnosing illness from images, including xrays, ultrasounds, CT scans, MRI.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I want to help
lenders.occupational_info: I care for people with chronic illnesses.

lenders.occupational_info: I help people that are affected by natural disasters.

lenders.name: Amir
lenders.loan_because: I want to see your business grow!
lenders.occupational_info: I invest in companies of all sizes to help them grow.

lenders.name: Tracey
lenders.loan_because: it's a way to help others improve their lives and achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Noma
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in other parts of the world that do not have as much as I do.  My children knew this and I got a gift certificate for Christmas.
lenders.occupational_info: I retired from working in hospitals.  I worked in the departments that took care of the supplies and equipment used by the medical staff for the patients.

lenders.name: David
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer programs for a big company

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: the microlending method empowers the entrepreneur to grow and develop their business enabling them to succeed on their own rather than charitable means.

lenders.name: Jerry

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva has a great approach of smarting small to make big changes.

lenders.name: Larry

lenders.occupational_info: Academic emergency physician and pediatrician, teacher and researcher.

lenders.name: Newts Greens Meds Uwitz
lenders.loan_because:
This year instead of giving Chritstmas presents to each other we put the money into Micro Loan investments.
We want to help people help themselves........small steps in the fight against global poverty.

The Newton, Green, Urowitz and Mederios families.

lenders.name: Ottavio
lenders.loan_because: together we can make this world a better place.

lenders.name: Norma
lenders.loan_because: I received a gift of Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: Produce

lenders.name: Krow
lenders.loan_because: It is a really good use of money to work together in improving our planet. As each of us here becomes more self sufficient and happier the world is in a better place. It is the collective that makes the whole and we are all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I work counseling people and helping people through rough situations and transitions in life.

lenders.name: Zach
lenders.loan_because: it is the root of our economic system and mobility that lets each one of us define the success of our own lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I determine whether programs to help people with alcohol and drug abuse problems are successful.

lenders.name: Bala
lenders.loan_because: I consider this a social cause which will serve the world's good.
lenders.occupational_info: Information Technology

lenders.name: James & Tricia
lenders.loan_because: We may not be rich, but we are both very blessed and want to do what we can.
lenders.occupational_info: James works in recreation for a University and Tricia is a lawyer.

lenders.name: Jimmy
lenders.loan_because: I want to "pay it forward" for all the help that people have provided me in my past.

lenders.name: Burton
lenders.loan_because: I am a fan of grass-roots capitalism
lenders.occupational_info: I get up early to make sure the horses are well fed and getting along well in their pastures.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I wish everyone would have the opportunities they deserve in life.

lenders.name: Darryl Rose
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to convince myself that I'm almost self-actualized.
lenders.occupational_info: I analyse data and present information so corporations can make better decisions.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I love the entrepreneurial spirit.

lenders.name: Phyllis
lenders.loan_because: KIVA is a wonderful way to help. My son helped me decide who to fund the first time, it was a great way to spend our holiday time.
lenders.occupational_info: Work as a grant program assistant

lenders.name: Emerald
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people and watch them succeed! Also seeing people succeed and knowing i took part in it makes me feel great!

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I believe in making connections across the globe. I like to travel and hope some day to visit someone I have made a loan to.
lenders.occupational_info: I coordinate media relations and public information for a small hospital in the Pacific Northwest. I am also a semi-professional stage and radio actor.

lenders.name: WIE
lenders.loan_because: We decided as a women's soccer team that we would pool our money and donate it while following the updates as a team!
lenders.occupational_info: We are North Suburban Chicago teachers that all play on a women's soccer team together in Libertyville, IL.

lenders.name: Rochelle & Bob
lenders.loan_because: encouraging the development of a community's economy is much more sustainable than a charitable donation. Simply giving money will not raise the global status of women or improve literacy or end poverty.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: My grandchildren and I work together to choose businesses to invest in.  It helps us all to better understand and respond to the worldwide needs of others.

lenders.name: Deepa
lenders.loan_because: Because I like the way the entrepreneurs utoilise the resources
lenders.occupational_info: CIvil Society Awareness

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: I want to see people released from poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I help hire good police officers, then I help those police officers get the training they need to do a good job protecting the public.  I also go to crime scenes and help catch and convict people who have commited horrible crimes.

lenders.name: Lon
lenders.loan_because: It's the least we can do.

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: We are all people.
lenders.occupational_info: I build roads and commercial buildings.

lenders.name: Stephanie

lenders.name: Evan

lenders.occupational_info: I work for Google Maps - a digital map of the world accessible via the internet: http://maps.google.com.

lenders.name: Nudyan

lenders.loan_because: I love.

lenders.name: shawni

lenders.name: Patterson Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to be able to reach out and help others. We are blessed to have everything we need.

lenders.name: Barry
lenders.loan_because: I'd rather you borrowed from me than from a bank
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in a government office. 

I ride my bike down the hill to work each day, but I catch the train home. The trains are old and rickety, but you can take your bike onboard for free.

lenders.name: Violeta
lenders.loan_because: People need to make their dreams a reality.
lenders.occupational_info:
I design clothing made with the highest concern for our environment, the people who make them and wear them, using organic, vintage and reclaimed materials.

Currently working on creative design projects in collaboration with indigenous communities in the Amazon, to promote their arts and crafts, by incorporating their millenary work into contemporary designs, as a means to generate a sustainable economy for the stewards of the most biodiverse ecosystem.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: it allows me to make a difference and help entrepreneurs bring their dreams to reality.
lenders.occupational_info: My work in the international trade area is constantly expanding. At work I specialize in providing foreign duty/tax information for over 138 countries. I'm also a licensed U.S. Customs Broker (number pending) where I'll assist importers with U.S. regulations and compliance.

lenders.name: Kathie and Brian
lenders.loan_because: I feel life is short and can melt away in a moment - so it isn't about what you have, it's about what you do.
lenders.occupational_info: We stand around alot , greet and meet people - weather forecasting ,the warmer it is the smaller we get.

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: it decreases worldsuck.
lenders.occupational_info: I help boys at a private school learn to love reading and provide them with a room full of books.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to be able to loan, making a big difference by contributing little

Currently I am involved in the cessation of several Ekofisk offshore constructions, the project will last until 2014.

lenders.name: D. Gail
lenders.loan_because: When I heard about this, I knew I wanted to help those who want to help themselves and their families.  And what a great Christmas gift to myself!
lenders.occupational_info:
Retired after 30 years from the Telecommunication
Business.  Now I am a "Domestic Engineer" and loving every minute.

lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a college student at San Diego State. Ifeel that this is organization one I can positively participate and actively be apart of something good.

lenders.name: Aaron
